Articles.Content:
Hi all,

 

I'm looking for some assistance with the radial connections on my lander.  I love the look of it but those radial Mk II tanks start jiggling under thrust.  Best shot space tape or is there perhaps a better way, bearing in mind the current capabilities of KSP 2?

 

Appreciate any tips!

 

Gallery:  https://imgur.com/gallery/JE8atxz
